sentences.english: We have the power and ability to overcome any obstacle in our path.
sentences.chinese: 我们有力量和能力去克服路途上的一切障碍。

sentences.english: If heaven is a million years away, oh just call me and I make your day.
sentences.chinese: 纵使路途遥远千年万年，我也必定将你带入那片天堂。

sentences.english: The economy is in the midst of a very rough patch. The worst is probably still ahead.
sentences.chinese: 经济仍在崎岖不平的路途中，最坏的事情还没发生。

sentences.english: Though it would be a long journey there, we can always play cards on the train.
sentences.chinese: 虽然路途会远一些，但是我们可以在火车上打牌啊。

sentences.english: The sun―on its ancient, unchanged path―was just growing bigger, and redder.
sentences.chinese: 那时，太阳循着亘古不变的路途正越来越大，也越红。

sentences.english: Even if a long journey, I will follow the love you left, Keep on moving.
sentences.chinese: 即使路途遥远，俺也会跟随着你留下地爱，继续前行。

sentences.english: He faced the long drive home with dread.
sentences.chinese: 回家的路途遥远，他心里有些害怕。

sentences.english: It is to your inner hidden deep within the road?
sentences.chinese: 那就是直抵你内心隐秘深处的路途么？

sentences.english: Yet it is one America should take, given the steep road ahead.
sentences.chinese: 然而，考虑到未来路途险阻，这正是美国应作的抉择。

sentences.english: It is quickest to walk across the field -- going round by road takes much longer .
sentences.chinese: 穿过田地路途最近绕行公路要远得多。

sentences.english: The Lakers have the fifth-best record in the West, but the race for first is tight.
sentences.chinese: 湖人战绩是西部第五，要成为第一，路途艰辛。

sentences.english: When yur leg is lengthened by the tool, you would feel the way is short thus the city is small.
sentences.chinese: 让你的脚被工具延长你就觉得路途变短了城市变小了。

sentences.english: Just tryin to find my way back home, back home.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想找到回去的路途。

sentences.english: I wanted to go there, but the journey is distance, needing to take a long-distance bus.
sentences.chinese: 很想去，但路途不近，需坐长途汽车。

sentences.english: We lost our way, so we inquired with an old man on the road.
sentences.chinese: 我们迷失了路途，所以就向一位老丈询问一了下。

sentences.english: Workers will build the new road at the end of this year .
sentences.chinese: 工人们将会在往年年末把这条新的路途修睦。

definition: on the road/on a journey/road surface
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
